paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.streaming.twitter._
val ssc = new StreamingContext(sc, Seconds(2))
val tweets = TwitterUtils.createStream(ssc, None)
val twt = tweets.window(Seconds(300))

%sql
select * from tweets where text like '%trump%' limit 100

paragraphs.text: %sql select createdAt, count(1) from tweets group by createdAt order by createdAt

%sql
select sentiment(text), count(1) from tweets where text like '%trump%' group by sentiment(text)
